name: mec/corporativo-commonsphp
description: Biblioteca com utilitários comuns e padrões.

suggest.doctrine/orm: Na versao[>=2.4.2], obrigatoria para utilizar a classe Commons/Pattern/Transaction/Strategy/EntityManagerTransactionStrategy e a classe de serializacao Commons/Util/Serializer/EntitySerializer.
suggest.zendframework/zend-di: Na versao[2.*], obrigatoria para utilizar a classe Commons/Pattern/Di/ZendLookupManager.
suggest.zendframework/zend-cache: Na versao[2.*], obrigatoria para utilizar a classe Commons/Pattern/Cache/CacheZendAdapter.
suggest.zendframework/zend-db: Na versao[2.*], obrigatoria para utilizar os pacotes Commons/Pattern/Db e Commons/Pattern/Transaction.
suggest.zendframework/zend-i18n: Na versao[2.*], obrigatoria para utilizar o pacote Commons/Country/Brazil/Validator.
suggest.zendframework/zend-inputfilter: Na versao[2.*], obrigatoria para utilizar o pacote Commons/Util/Input.
suggest.zendframework/zend-validator: Na versao[2.*], obrigatoria para utilizar o pacote Commons/Country/Brazil/Validator.
suggest.zendframework/zend-serializer: Na versao[2.*], obrigatoria para utilizar o pacote Commons/Util/Serializer.
